projects.1.desc: Development of a web application to manage materials in an ornamental workshop. The system allows you to record inventory entries and exits, control stock, generate reports, and view low inventory alerts. Implemented with Flask, SQLite, and SQLAlchemy following the MVC pattern. Includes user authentication, role control (admin and operator), and statistical charts with Chart.js.
